snippet.title: Zarya 1 - Trailer
snippet.description:
ZARYA-1 is an interactive fiction (IF) game that takes place on the far side of the Moon. You are tasked with supervising a team of four specialists in an effort to locate and explore the source of a mysterious signal. Your decisions will matter - but the consequences aren't always clear, and sometimes disaster will happen. Every choice you make will give you a slightly different perspective on the events that will unfold - and with it, another grain of the truth. Will you be able to piece together the whole story?

Download for FREE:
iOS: https://goo.gl/6EMhtD
Android: https://goo.gl/NmQf2S
AppleTV: https://goo.gl/NgJzqD
Mac: https://goo.gl/g5VXAf
PC: https://goo.gl/ODG3So
Linux: https://goo.gl/ODG3So
Tizen: https://goo.gl/Xf3cYj
Xbox: Coming soonn

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Your-Story-Interactive-1108222225972296/
